pros:
- Great opportunities for those beginning a career in Social Services
- Great benefits (3 weeks vacation, Health, Dental benefits).
- Free parking for staff at the main office
- No micromanaging.
cons: - The office is in one of the world's most expensive cities to live in (Metro Vancouver). Non-profit careers don't mean that staff shouldn't make a profit in their chosen profession.

job_title: Line Cook/Prep/Cool/Cleaner/Dish Washer in New Westminster, BC
pros: Was an OK experience, everyone is nice and respectful
cons: The cons were a lot of the work I was doing wasnt in the job description

pros: There are nice team to volunteer at The Mainland Purpose Society for Youth and Families. They have a free lunch for volunteers.
cons: There are different programs at The Mainland Purpose Society for Youth and Families. Few clients of Stride program are not polite.
